item.title: [GRA7][WebPaaS] - Routine Maintenance
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Apr 6, 19:00 - 21:00 UTC

Mar 17, 22:25 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 06/04/2023 19:00 UTC
End time : 06/04/2023 21:00 UTC
Service impact : All projects and environments will continue to function during the upgrade; however, Console User Interface, Git and Crons will be unavailable during the reindexing of git logs, which may take up to 6 hours.
Service improvement : Our partner communicated to OVHCloud that they will be doing a routine maintenance on customers' projects. This maintenance is expected to not have impact on the projects: no downtime, nor performance issue are expected.

item.title: [GRA][WebHosting] - SharedSQL database unavailable
item.description:
Mar 21, 00:05 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 20/03/2023 18:31 UTC
End Time : 20/03/2023 22:54 UTC
Root cause : The incident is due to the loss of the Public Cloud host.
Current status : Resolved

Mar 20, 23:14 UTC
Monitoring - Update : Our teams have completed the restoration. The services are operational. Checks are in progress before confirming the final resolution of the incident.

Mar 20, 22:49 UTC
Update - Update : The restoration is still in progress. Some databases are accessible again.

Mar 20, 21:46 UTC
Update - Half of the restoration is done.

Mar 20, 20:32 UTC
Identified - Service impact : SharedSQL databases hosted on the one PublicCloud instance down are impacted.
Root cause : PublicCloud Host down
Ongoing actions : backup restoration ongoing
Our technical teams are hands on the issue.

Mar 20, 18:59 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 20/03/2023 18:31 UTC
Service impact : service is down.
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.
